title: Yext CFO on IPOs, SPACs, and New Book
itunes:title: Yext CFO on IPOs, SPACs, and New Book
description:
Steve Cakebread, CFO at Yext, discusses IPOs, SPACs and his new book "The IPO Playbook: An Insider’s Guide on Taking Your Company Public and How to Do It Right."

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
